description: Their Fitz Roy Icon Uprisal Crew Sweatshirt is made of 100% recycled knit fleece that has a brushed interior and natural stretch. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, this garment reduces our reliance on virgin raw materials. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Fitz Roy Icon Uprisal Crew Sweatshirt - Unisex
